extendedInfo.description: Lite/Free version of Zen Garden.Upgrade for tons more objects and features.  With upgrade, you can save your designs, take snapshots and save in your Gallery (so you can share, email, use as wallpaper, etc.)Use your finger as the rake to draw lines in the sand while you relax to the different soothing sounds.Shake the phone to erase lines.If you have ideas or want certain objects, email us.If you can't rate this App 4 stars, email us with improvements.Uses Flurry for usage collection

reviews.title: Dirty code
reviews.comment: Small square of sand on Galaxy Tab 10.1 but you can still draw in the \"sand\" in the black space. In other woods the code is fixed size and not compatible with larger screen resolutions
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs to save
reviews.comment: Needs to be able to save or their is no point in installing.i will rate 5 if you update it to save. And more items would be good or another rake
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Sounds Like Fun & Relaxing \"Zen On The Road\" But It\'s Boring. I Wish It Was Fun. :(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good music but...
reviews.comment: What\'s the point of this game? Like, what are you suppost to do? Make a garden....then what?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but...
reviews.comment: I understand they want to make money at it but they could at least allow saving in the free version.  Very relaxing but not being able to save after all the time and effort makes it less fun.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing BUT....
reviews.comment: I love this and it\'s very relaxing. BUT I think the full version is overpriced. I did want to get it but do not have that kind of money to spend on this. But more options for the lite version would be very appreciated. And make it even better.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very Soothing
reviews.comment: Nice, relaxing app with good, easy to use features, and calming effects.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: This app isn\'t suppose to be a game. Its a mini zen garden and so relaxing to play with.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Rubish & ripped off
reviews.comment: Ok so it\'s not set up for tablets so you get an ugly grey rectangle with black backround, really should have fixed this, especially as you can draw on the black! A border would have been nice. Very annoyed that not even a credit goes to \"Deep Forest\" who they ripped the music from. Maybe they don\'t want any nasty legal actions! And Why does something so basic need so many intrusive & dangerous permissions? Seriously,  I want to know. Best avoided.  Much better apps out there.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Have had this app for a while but rarely use it. Not enough elements in free version. The concept is great tho.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great but small sized
reviews.comment: This is a really nice zen garden with many options. I would upgrade to full version if it would occupy the whole screen in a 10.1\" tablet. Even better, a multi-window option would be really nice!
reviews.author: Luis Fokker

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Its a fun app. I know its the free version but it would be that much better if we had more things to choose from and maybe a save option? But otherwise nice app :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Rather pointless
reviews.comment: Really what\'s the point of this app. Isn\'t it better to go for a walk instead of staring at glowing screen if you want to relax?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Really good
reviews.comment: Very good zenith garden app although the demo should include a little more items and the the music could he its own app itself!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It is
reviews.comment: a very nice game...No one should miss it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: RELAXING
reviews.comment: Really relaxing
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It is pretty fun but boring and I have problems because I try to move stuff and it uses the stinking rake and I have had a real mini Zen garden
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Its a realy good app when I get angry
reviews.author: Landon Coleman

reviews.comment: Nice but I want more rakes
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app...
reviews.comment: Loving this app, very relaxing. Especially with the music from Deep Forest to accompany.
reviews.author: A Google User
